ing: 1 (8 ounce) tub PHILADELPHIA 1/3 Less Fat than Cream Cheese
1/2 cup KRAFT 2% Milk Shredded Sharp Cheddar Cheese
n: Creamy Crab and Red Pepper Spread
des: "Sweet, tender lump crabmeat in a creamy spread with green onions and red peppers makes for an upscale appetizer spread."
ins:
Reserve 2 tablespoons onions. Mix remaining onions with all remaining ingredients except crackers.
Refrigerate 1 hour.
Top with reserved onions. Serve with crackers.
